chain.description:
Question: You mentioned the most famous island in the USA, but could you specify which island you're referring to? I assume you might mean Hawaii (specifically Waikiki Beach in Honolulu) or perhaps one of the Hawaiian Islands like Maui. Could you clarify the exact destination island so I can help you with weather information and beach images?

The reason I'm asking for clarification is that I can help you with:
1. Finding beach images using the search_image_for_google_search_json tool
2. Searching for web information about the destination

However, for precise daily weather forecasts, I want to be transparent that the current toolset doesn't include a direct weather forecasting API. I can search for weather websites or recent weather information, but I cannot provide real-time 7-day forecasts.

Could you please confirm:
- Which specific island are you planning to visit?
- Would you like me to find beach images and general weather information for that location?

Thought: I'll help you find information about Hawaii island (also known as the Big Island) by searching for beach images and some general weather information.

First, I'll search for beach images:

chain.observation: {"error": "", "response": "{'status': 'success', 'items': [{'title': 'Beaches | Big Island of Hawaii | Paradise In Hawaii', 'thumbnailImageUrl': 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTKyDb5kBaG9S4yK0xz6byfurfiJx2KONckqBTZXKnNa1NJO4w&s', 'originalImageUrl': 'https://www.paradiseinhawaii.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/MainHeader1000h.jpg', 'contextLink': 'https://www.paradiseinhawaii.com/big-island-beaches/', 'height': 1000, 'width': 1500, 'size': '332KB'}, {'title': 'Island of Hawaii Beaches | Big Island Beaches | Go Hawaii', 'thumbnailImageUrl': 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRtuuPqlYrtNwmU8AsbAcynBsmsGVhZZnQULYIctX-1c9eFTuew&s', 'originalImageUrl': 'https://www.gohawaii.com/sites/default/files/styles/image_gallery_bg_xl/public/hero-unit-images/Hapuna%20Beach%20State%20Park.jpg.webp?itok=L_3StqmX', 'contextLink': 'https://www.gohawaii.com/islands/hawaii-big-island/things-to-do/beaches', 'height': 1280, 'width': 1920, 'size': '221KB'}, {'title': 'The Complete Guide to B...

chain.description: Now, I'll search for general weather information:
{"q": "Hawaii Big Island current weather conditions typical climate", "num": 7}
Thought: I'll provide a comprehensive overview based on the information I've gathered.

{"return_type": "give_answer", "final_answer": "Beach Vacation Guide for Hawaii Island (Big Island):

Beach Highlights:
- The Big Island offers stunning beaches with diverse landscapes
- Notable beaches include Hapuna Beach State Park, known for its white sand and crystal-clear waters
- Beaches range from black sand to white sand, offering unique experiences

Weather Characteristics:
Unfortunately, I cannot provide a precise 7-day forecast, but here's general climate information:
- Hawaii Island typically has a warm, tropical climate year-round
- Average daytime temperatures range from 75-85°F (24-29°C)
- Two main seasons: 
  1. Summer (May to October): Warmer and drier
  2. Winter (November to April): Slightly cooler with more occasional rainfall

Recommended Preparation:
- Pack lightweight, breathable clothing
- Bring sunscreen, hat, and sunglasses
- Check local weather forecasts closer to your travel date for most accurate information

For precise daily weather forecasts, I recommend:
1. Checking local weather websites
2. Consulting your hotel or a local weather service
3. Using weather apps specific to Hawaii Island

Beach Image Sources:
- Images show beautiful beaches with varying landscapes
- Beaches feature white and black sand, clear waters, and scenic backgrounds

Pro Tip: The Big Island's weather can vary significantly due to its diverse microclimates, so be prepared for potential quick changes in weather conditions."}

function.name: search_image_for_google_search_json
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "google_search_json", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint is used to perform image search using the Google Search JSON API. You can send a request with parameters like **q** (search query), **num** (desired number of images), **start** (starting index of results), and others. The request will genera"

num.description:
Number of search results to return.
Valid values are integers between 1 and 20, inclusive

lr.description: Restricts the search to documents written in a particular language

start.description: The index of the first result to return

gl.description: The **gl** parameter value is a two-letter country code. The **gl** parameter boosts search results whose country of origin matches the parameter value.

function.name: search_web_for_google_search_json
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "google_search_json", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint is used to perform text search on the web using the Google Search JSON API. You can send a request with various parameters such as **q** (search query), **num** (desired number of results), **start** (starting index of results),  and more. Th"

num.description:
Number of search results to return.
Valid values are integers between 1 and 20, inclusive

start.description: The index of the first result to return

gl.description: The **gl** parameter value is a two-letter country code. The **gl** parameter boosts search results whose country of origin matches the parameter value.

lr.description: Restricts the search to documents written in a particular language

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

train_messages.content:

First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, you need to give your thought to analyze the status now and what to do next, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.
Remember: 
1.the state change is irreversible, you can't go back to one of the former state, if you want to restart the task, say "I give up and restart".
2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
Let's Begin!
Task description: You should use functions to help handle the real time user querys. Remember:
1.ALWAYS call "Finish" function at the end of the task. And the final answer should contain enough information to show to the user,If you can't handle the task, or you find that function calls always fail(the function is not valid now), use function Finish->give_up_and_restart.

1.google_search_json: Provides Google search results in JSON format. Its features include web search, image search, autocomplete, and trending search.
